Sign In.title: Welcome
Sign In.subtitle: Please sign in using your account

help.title: Help
help.description-1: Your manager created an account for you. Please check your email to create your new password.
help.description-2: If you find any problem please contact your supervisor.

Email sent.title: Email sent
Email sent.description: Please check your email to reset your password.

shared:reset-password.title: Reset password
shared:reset-password.description: Please provide your email so will send you an email to reset your password.
